description: This file is a C header file defining interfaces and constants for the jsonhal_lib_wrp module, including function declarations for initializing and manipulating JSON parameters, and creating JSON request messages.

methods.name: jsonhal_init
methods.description: Initializes the jsonhal library with the specified configuration file.

methods.name: jsonhal_getparam
methods.description: Retrieves the value of a specified parameter.

methods.name: jsonhal_setparam
methods.description: Sets the value of a specified parameter.

methods.name: create_json_request_message
methods.description: Creates a JSON request message based on the specified action type and parameters.
